snippet: Congregations and other religious sites have long been targets of violence and vandalism, especially African-American churches going back at least to the civil rights movement.
abstract: Churches and religious sites across America focus on implementing safety measures in response to fatal shooting at historically black church in Charleston, SC, and other violent attacks.
lead_paragraph: Congregations and other religious sites have long been targets of violence and vandalism, especially African-American churches going back at least to the civil rights movement.

headline.main: Religious Congregations Are Stressing Safety After a Season of Violence
headline.print_headline: Religious Congregations Are Stressing Safety After a Season of Violence
